metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Marlono Rhandle - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group3_Prisoner2 926d2515-b22a-4b51-8737-42a6c1ebd4f4 - (37; 39; 49) in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Marlono Rhandle
0.text: My sincerest thanks, friend. I don't know what possessed you to find us in that place, but I am surely glad you did.

1.speaker: Marlono Rhandle
1.text: I need to gather my bearings, then find Jheff. My darling Jheff.
